# `r title_name`


```{r results='asis'}
for (modname in modnames) {
  idx <- match(modname, modnames)
  if (idx %in% c(1:4)) {
    subtitle_name <- modname
    cat(knitr::knit_child("code/heading2.qmd", quiet = TRUE))
  } else {
    for (site in sites) {
      subtitle_name <- sprintf("%s (%s)", modname, site)
      cat(knitr::knit_child("code/heading2.qmd", quiet = TRUE))
    }
  }
}
```
